So in terms of running this script; if we're not uploading a tar-ball, then we should be able to invoke this script from anywhere? Ie. we don't have to be in the current directory of the repo we want to release, since we're not tagging and all that. So is the following what you used to release simbody 3.3?
~~~
~/ $ path/to/release_tools/release.py --dry-run -r 1 -u -e simbody 3.3 TOKEN
~~~
